game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Raid the lost temple and retrieve the ancient artifact.
game.description: A mysterious temple has been discovered deep in the jungle, and rumors of a powerful artifact hidden within its walls have drawn the attention of many adventurers. Brave the dangers of the temple and retrieve the artifact before rival treasure hunters do.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, magical amulet granting +10% resistance to fire

task.objective: Reach the entrance of the lost temple.
task.description: Make your way through the dense jungle and navigate the ancient ruins to reach the entrance of the lost temple.

task.objective: Disable the traps in the main hall.
task.description: Avoid deadly traps and pitfalls as you make your way through the main hall of the temple.

task.objective: Retrieves the ancient artifact from the inner sanctum.
task.description: Bypass magical wards and guardians to claim the ancient artifact in the heart of the temple.
